## VerticalConfig interface

The configuration for a vertical.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface VerticalConfig 
```

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [CardComponent?](./answers-react-components-sendhelp.verticalconfig.cardcomponent.md) | [CardComponent](./answers-react-components-sendhelp.cardcomponent.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The card to use for this vertical. |

|  [viewAllButton?](./answers-react-components-sendhelp.verticalconfig.viewallbutton.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether or not this vertical should show a button to view all results on the vertical page. |
